"	"ABOUT: "
" Learning Assistant is a readily available mobile application to help provide lecture schedule information to students and to lecturers in an efficient way to manage their weekly classes "
"Resources "
" The following are the resources used in the development of the application "
"
Android-Studio: Development"
"
Java: Functionality"
"
XML: layout"
"
FireBase: Real-time Database"
"
For feedback please get in touch with:- "\n"Programmer: mathewdrucker@gmail.com "\n"Product Owner: dennohyego1@gmail.com

ABOUT APPLICATION"
" Learning Assistant is a lecture-centric mobile app for the Cooperative University Student and Lecturers."
" It aims to be of great help in the scheduling and arrangement of the lectures so as to improve on the lecture attendance by the students and teaching by lecturers. "

"WHY? "
"The app is motivated by the need to provide a readily available dynamic lecture schedule that changes accordingly with the university timetable releases.
"

"GOAL: "
"To Provide timely information about the lectures. "
"To provide class customized view of the timetable for the students "
"To provide lecturer customized view of the timetable "
"To quickly incorporate timetable changes into the app in realtime"
"
"
"PURPOSE: "
" 1. To help the stakeholders be aware and in control of their lecture schedules "
" 2. To improve the lecture attendance and teaching "
" 3. To improve the general performance of students "
" 4. Help aid in lecturer organisation and planning
"

"DISCLAIMER: "
" The application is still under active development and should not be used for actual planning "
" Some information may be misleading or omitted , more clarification pending "
" more functionality is upcoming as development is still underway
"

"NOTICE: "
" The app is made to be driven and be complemenatry to the university lecture scheduling as provided by the university timetabler whom we will be working with closely in future release versions of the application for better user experience

Query Instructions"
"
1. Fill in the data entry slots above appropriately"
" 2. Fill in the data correctly as per the hints provided "
" 3. Press the Query button to submit your query "
" 4. Check the display below for the output of your query "
"
